name: Golf? (itch)
description:
A short game I've made in 2 days for Mini Jam 84. The limitation for the Jam was "You are your own ammo". 

In this game you play a game of golf in which you are the one being hit. Try to reach the flag at the end of each level.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

LMB / Space - Launch yourself

Assets used:

TileSet

Character
